answerText: The Temptation of Saint Anthony (or La Tentation de Saint Antoine)[10] The Temptation of Saint Anthony is by this author, who also created the adulterous Emma Bovary.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Michigan A, MIT A | 2 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] Name this book, written in the form of a play, which was inspired by a Bruegel painting. Its title character resists his desire for Ammonaria and the lure of the satanic Hilarion.
